  • Constructor Details

    • Geom_PlaneSOMExample

      public Geom_PlaneSOMExample(Geom_PlaneMapMgr _mapMgr, SOM_ExDataType _exType, String _oid, SOM_GeomSamplePointf[] _srcSmpls, int _numSmplPts, boolean _shouldBuildSamples, boolean _shouldBuildVisRep)
      Constructor for plane object to render and use as a training example,
      Parameters:
      _mapMgr - : owning map manager
      _exType - : whether this is training/testing/validation etc.
      _oid - : pre-defined string ID put in SOM_Example OID field
      _srcSmpls - : the points and owning objects that make up the minimally defining set of points for this object. If src objects are null, then this object is a foundation/source object
      _numSmplPts - : # of sample points to build for this object TODO move to post-construction process
      _shouldBuildSamples - : whether we should build samples for this object
      _shouldBuildVisRep - : whether we should pre-build a mesh representation of this object

    • Geom_PlaneSOMExample

      public Geom_PlaneSOMExample(Geom_PlaneMapMgr _mapMgr, SOM_ExDataType _exType, String _oid, String _csvDat)
      Constructor to build a plane based on csv data
      Parameters:
      _mapMgr - : owning map manager
      _exType - : whether this is training/testing/validation etc.
      _oid - : pre-defined string ID put in SOM_Example OID field
      _csvDat - : String from CSV describing object

    • findTVal

      public float findTVal(base_Math_Objects.vectorObjs.floats.myPointf pt, int idx)
      return the t value for point along given basis - POINT IS ASSUMED TO BE ON PLANE ALREADY
      Parameters:
      pt -
      idx - either 0 or 1, for which basis we are checking
      Returns:
      t value for point along given basis

    • getPlanarEqFromPointAndNorm

      public float[] getPlanarEqFromPointAndNorm(base_Math_Objects.vectorObjs.floats.myVectorf _n, base_Math_Objects.vectorObjs.floats.myPointf _p)
      point normal form of plane
      Parameters:
      _n - unit normal of plane
      _p - point on plane
      Returns:
      eq : coefficients of the plane equation in the form eq[0]*x + eq[1]*y + eq[2]*z + eq[3] = 0
